name: SoftUnLocked
description:
You can also play this on the Pico-8 bbs: http://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=28587

Just a simple puzzle game about matching squishy colorful blocks.

No buttons, just arrows to control.

Just try to get a high score. Make sure not to get too many blocks. Bad things will happen if you let too many blocks appear on the screen. And you should definitely not try to make that happen as fast as possible.

"i'm impressed with how much physics-like behavior has been crammed into the pico-8 here?? like dang"
-@eevee
